period.description: poll period in seconds since start to end. If 0 poll will be called once

days.description: DIW,1,4 - day in week. 1 - mon, 7 - sun. 0 - every day. -1 - single shot at start

months.description: 0 - every months. 1-jan, 12-dec. -1 - single shot at start

years.description: 0 - every year, XXXX - year. -1 - single shot at start
